author: wn.com
title: Adelphi University’s Best of Broadway: Gold, Rubies and Pearls (Adelphi University)
text: ( Source : Adelphi University ) The Department of Music at Adelphi University is proud to present the latest installment of its Best of Broadway concerts titled Gold , Rubies and Pearls celebrating the anniversaries of many Broadway classics.
